Comment: Errrr…. You’d be surprised how many of the “journals” you read online are just doctors writing what they’ve observed about a small sample of their patients, or even an individual patient. Journals range from the complex and revolutionary to the mostly mundane observations. It’s why the common person shouldn’t read them and jump to conclusions. Most people searching through them just find the key words they are looking for in an article, read the abstract and don’t really understand process, observations or the conclusion.
